attributes.action: Stop greedy child Benifit claimants after 3rd child
attributes.background: Benefit system is abused and people don't want to work and earn but sit back and keep having children and benefiting from them but the law needs to change and no more claiming after 3 children

rejection.details: If you would like the benefits system to be changed, so that parents are only eligible for child benefit (or other benefits) for up to three children, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you want to see.
